name: Running Through Time (RTT)
description: Summary: Nicole used to have a normal life as a teenager, until the death of her grandfather gave her great responsability. Before he died, he left her a small diary containing little pieces of information about his life as an adventurer. Between the pages of the diary, Nicole discovers a medalion with an inscripion that when pronounced, sumons a magical creature that will guide her into a whole new adventure. As the game advances, you must defeat enemies and solve small puzzels, finding ways to locate the missing parts of the medalion. There's no time to waste, restore the past and fix the universe! Good luck!
